__TOC__


Ubuntu Localization and Translations issues are handled by the <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations | Ubuntu Translations (ubuntu-translations) project]]</nowiki>.

The project is used in the following purpose:
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations|tracking internationalization bugs in the applications included in Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations|tracking erros in translations from Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations|provide support to the Ubuntu community for things related to the translation process]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/+bugs?field.tag=task|tracking of current tasks and actions toward improving the Ubuntu Translation process]]</nowiki>

=== Ubuntu I18N/L10n issues ===

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=i18n | Ubuntu bugs with internationalization tag ]]</nowiki>

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/rosetta | Bugs in Launchpad Translation system (Rosetta)]]</nowiki> - You can report any bug or add any feature request for '''Launchpad Translations (Rosetta)''' using Launchpad Bugs. For other bugs, just use the normal Ubuntu bug reporting process and tag them with ''i18n'' or ''l10n''.

=== Reporting i18n/l10n issues ===
==== Ubuntu issue ====
Please see: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Translations/KnowledgeBase/ReportingBugs

==== Launchpad Translations issue ====
Launchpad Translations is the web tool used for translating Ubuntu. Issues should be reported against the <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/launchpad | Launchpad project]]</nowiki>.

If you have problems using Launchpad Translations please consult the <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/Translations | Launchpad Translations help pages]]</nowiki>. If after reading the help pages you still have questions, please ask them using <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/launchpad | Launchpad Answers]]</nowiki>.

Before adding a bug for Launchpad Translations please make sure this is not actually an Ubuntu bug.

Here is a (non-exhaustive) list of problems that should be filled against Launchpad Translations:

* if submitting a suggestion or translation causes an error in the web application
